Caption: Mrs. and Mr. Krishna Mahesh at the entrance of the Heritage Centre.
Description: Mrs and Mr. Krishna Mahesh visited Heritage Centre, IIT Madras on 16-03-2020. Mr. Krishna Mahesh launched the Institute Chair Professorship in memory of his father late Mr. K Mahesh [1965/BT/MT] an alumnus with IITM on 16 March 2020
